page.title: 13A HAILSHAM POLICEMAN
page.content: { In the Hailsham Police Force there {is a Superintendent, a Chief Inspector {3 Inspectors, Sergeants and about 65 {Constables. P.C Mills works on a shift basis. He works one of these shifts: 6am - 2pm, 2pm - 10pm or 10pm - 6am. When he goes to the Police Station, he first collects his equipment and then is briefed in the Briefing Room about what has happened the shift before and what his duties are that day. When he goes out he always carries a{Warrant Card}with him and if he goes patrolling the streets, a {Walkie Talkie.}He also carries a {truncheon, handcuffs}and a{pocket {notebook.}He can also go on car duty in a South Car, that covers up to Polegate, or a North Car which goes as far as Heathfield.
